name: SnatchCode
tag_list: backup, solution, snatchcode, one, click, online, free, pro, best
overview:
SnatchCode is a online tool for webmaster’s to get there website safe and protected. Many a times small and medium businesses or webmaster’s find a problem of taking there website backups everyday or whenever a change is been made. There are many softwares and tools today for taking backups but instead of making the work more easier they create a confusion in the user mind due to which 80% of the small business are not having there backup.

To solve this problem Snatchcode as introduce there one click backup solution which helps people like us to take backups in a single click which means No softwares or no high price services. They provide there service in two types : Free and Plus.

Snatchcode is really easy to setup , they request you your ftp details and do the rest.

The user interface is as simple as it can be with a touch of magic. Overall SnatchCode is a complete one click backup solution for small and medium businesses or individuals who want to keep themselves safe from the world of hackers.
